markdownRemark.html: The educational programme at this school is fully endorsed by the Spanish Ministry of Education. The school teaches English from infant to primary (80% English, 20% Spanish). English and Spanish in high school and baccalaureate. Other languages - French and German. Extracurricular Activities - Fun Science, Basketball, Rhythmic Gymnastics, Aloha, Chess, Multisport. Sports - Basketball, Rhythmic Gymnastics. Summer camps - June and July.

frontmatter.title: Torrequebrada International College
